item.title: Your Desk Just Moved To The Cloud
item.description:
By: John Shepler The 20th century saw a significant shift in employment, moving from farm work to factory jobs and finally to office positions. Now, the 21st century is experiencing another major change as workplaces transition from offices to the cloud. The Cloud is Here and Now Contrary to the idea of the cloud being a distant concept, it has become an integral part of our present reality. Nearly everything we do has or will soon have a cloud connection...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/your-desk-just-moved-to-the-cloud/

item.title: HP introduces two phablets in the Indian market
item.description:
HP has introduced two new mobile devices to their collection: the 6-inch HP Slate6 VoiceTab and the 7-inch HP Slate7 VoiceTab. These “voice tablets” will be released in India this February*. These devices combine the functions of a phone and a tablet into one portable design. “The voice tablet market is growing because consumers want to combine their phones and tablets into one device,” said Ron Coughlin, Senior VP of HP’s Consumer Personal Systems Group...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/hp-introduces-two-phablets-in-the-indian-market/
